name: Automate weekly Hollywood film briefing via Tavily and Gemini

parameters.text:
=You are an AI summarizer creating a daily Hollywood film industry briefing. You will receive four Tavily search results: - Hollywood movies releasing this week - Hollywood box office results last week - Hollywood news - Must‚Äëwatch Hollywood movies currently in theatres Each result contains `title` and `content`. --- ### TASK Summarize each result into Gmail‚Äëfriendly HTML with emojis and bullet points: üé¨ Releases üìä Box Office üì∞ News üé• Must-Watch Movies For **Must-Watch Movies**: - If details (reviews/hype) exist, summarize them briefly. - If only movie names appear, **assume reasons** (e.g., ‚Äúgreat for IMAX/4DX,‚Äù ‚Äúbig visual effects,‚Äù ‚Äúaudience buzz,‚Äù or ‚Äúfan‚Äëfavorite franchise‚Äù). If no data at all, write ‚ÄúNo data available‚Äù. --- ### OUTPUT FORMAT Return JSON: { "subject": "Daily Hollywood Film Industry Briefing ‚Äì {{ $json['Readable date'] }}", "body": " üé¨ Releases
  • Movie 1
üìä Box Office
  • Result 1
üì∞ News
  • Update 1
üé• Must-Watch Movies
  • Recommendation 1 with assumed reason (if needed)
" }

parameters.content:
## Try It Out! üé¨(for free)

### This n8n template demonstrates how to build a **weekly Hollywood film industry briefing** using Tavily for real-time search and Google Gemini for summarization. It sends a concise, emoji‚Äëstyled email with **movie releases, box office results, industry news, and must‚Äëwatch recommendations**.

Use cases: Perfect for **film journalists, entertainment blogs, or movie fans** who want an automated weekly update in their inbox.

### How it works

* **Trigger:** Scheduled every Thursday morning (configurable).
* **Search:** Four Tavily API calls fetch:
  * Movies releasing this week
  * Last week‚Äôs box office results
  * Hollywood industry news
  * Must-watch movies currently in theatres
* **Summarization:** Google Gemini processes the search results and formats them into Gmail‚Äëfriendly HTML with emojis and bullet points.
* **Output:** Email sent automatically via Gmail node with subject and formatted briefing.

### How to use

* Configure **Tavily API** and **Gmail OAuth2** credentials in n8n.
* (Optional) Edit search queries in Tavily nodes to focus on specific genres or regions.
* Adjust the **schedule trigger** to your preferred day/time.

### Requirements

* Tavily API account (free tier available)
* Google Gemini API key for summarization
* Gmail account (OAuth2 credentials)

### Need Help?

DM me on [X (formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/manav170303) or email [titanfactz@gmail.com](mailto:titanfactz@gmail.com).

Always open to feedback and improvements!

## Example Email Output

**Daily Hollywood Film Industry Briefing ‚Äì 2025, 07:00 am**
Inbox

[titanfactz@gmail.com](mailto:titanfactz@gmail.com)
07:00am (0 minutes ago)
to me

## üé¨ **Releases**
* Dora and the Search for Sol Dorado (July 2, 2025)
* Jurassic World Rebirth (July 2, 2025)
* The Old Guard 2 (July 2, 2025)
* The Sound (June 27, 2025)

## üìä **Box Office**
* Fantastic Four: First Steps ‚Äì estimated \$40M-\$45M opening
* Bad Guys 2 ‚Äì estimated \$22M opening
* Naked Gun ‚Äì estimated \$16M opening
* Together ‚Äì estimated \$10M+ over 5-day opening
* Superman ‚Äì \$24.8 million last week (\$289.5 million total)
* Jurassic World: Rebirth ‚Äì \$13.0 million last week (\$301.5 million total)
* F1: The Movie ‚Äì \$6.2 million last week (\$165.5 million total)

## üì∞ **News**
* Michael Pe√±a joins Chris Hemsworth and Lily James in Amazon‚Äôs new submarine action film, *Subversion*.
* Casting director seeks 2,000 extras for a massive concert scene in the new TV series *9-1-1*.
* *Emily in Paris* casting director Juliette Menager discusses finding Sylvie and Camille Razat‚Äôs exit.

## üé• **Must-Watch Movies**
* Caught by the Tides ‚Äì Jia Zhangke‚Äôs latest experimental film blending memories and archives.
* Sinners ‚Äì Highly rated 9.5/10, a compelling cinematic experience.
* Fantastic Four: The First Steps ‚Äì A big Marvel win, rated 9/10 with stunning visuals.
* MI: The Final Reckoning ‚Äì Rated 8.5/10, audiences are buzzing about this action-packed finale.
* Superman ‚Äì Fan-favorite franchise, rated 8.5/10, delivering powerful storytelling.
* Ballerina ‚Äì Rated 8.5/10, expected to feature breathtaking choreography and action.
* Thunderbolts ‚Äì Rated 7.5/10, thrilling ensemble film with dynamic character arcs.

parameters.text:
=You are an AI summarizer creating a daily Hollywood film industry briefing.
You have access to web search and must perform FOUR structured searches and summarize results into a clean, factual briefing.

Search Tasks
1) Weekly Movie Releases (Hollywood)
Find up to 10 movies releasing in theatres THIS WEEK ONLY.

Strictly exclude:

OTT releases or web series

Old or previously released movies (even if trending or re-released)

Monthly/yearly recap lists

Provide for each movie:

Name

Exact release date

Day of the week (e.g., Friday)

Verify releases are between Monday‚ÄìSunday of the current week based on {{ $json['Readable date'] }}.
If fewer than 10, include as many accurate releases as possible.

2) Box Office Results (Hollywood)
Find:

Top highest-grossing Hollywood films of THIS YEAR (worldwide gross)

Last week‚Äôs box office performance (Hollywood) with gross numbers

Highlight notable new releases and trends (e.g., record-breaking debut, strong overseas performance).

Current week is {{ $json['Readable date'] }}, current day is {{ $json['Day of week'] }}.
Ignore any box office data older than last week.

3) Industry Buzz (Casting / Directors / Strikes)
Provide exactly 7 major updates from Hollywood:

Casting announcements

Director signings/new projects

Production updates & filming progress

Strikes, controversies, industry events

Must be from this week only (ignore outdated news).
Provide detailed summaries (context + relevance).
Do not include links ‚Äî summaries only.
Must always give 7 updates, even if some are long.

4) Best Movies Currently in Theatres
Recommend best currently running Hollywood movies in theatres in Surat, India.

Exclude old films (e.g., pre-2025 releases like Fast X or Oppenheimer).

Provide:

Why recommended (reviews, visuals, fan hype)

Best format (e.g., IMAX, 3D, standard)

Only include movies running this week or recently released (before {{ $json['Readable date'] }}).

Formatting Rules
Movie names must be plain text (no bold, no markdown).

Use emojis for section headers:

üé¨ Releases

üìä Box Office

üì∞ Industry Buzz

üé• Must-Watch in Theatres

Include release dates, box office numbers where available.

If no data for a section, output ‚ÄúNo data available‚Äù (do not guess).

Output Requirements
Return as a JSON object with two keys:

subject: Daily Hollywood Film Industry Briefing ‚Äì {{ $json['Readable date'] }}

body: Full HTML email (Gmail-friendly) with sections, bullet lists, emojis, and clean formatting. No markdown.

Critical Instructions
Use only fresh search results (ignore outdated or evergreen data).

Exclude re-released films unless explicitly stated as new this week.

Ensure weekly relevance: include only events/releases around this week‚Äôs date.

Avoid duplicates; merge similar data cleanly.

Prioritize accuracy ‚Äî if unsure, clearly state ‚ÄúNo data available.‚Äù

parameters.content:
**Subject:** Daily Hollywood Film Industry Briefing ‚Äì August 3, 2025

---

Good morning,
Here's your daily Hollywood film briefing for August 3, 2025:

---

üé¨ **Releases**

* The Bad Guys 2 ‚Äì Released Friday, August¬†1,¬†2025
* The Naked Gun ‚Äì Released Friday, August¬†1,¬†2025

These are the confirmed new wide theatrical Hollywood releases this week (Monday through Sunday of current week). No additional new Hollywood theatrical releases found for this week.

---

üìä **Box Office**

**Highest‚Äëgrossing Hollywood films of 2025 (worldwide):**

* Ne Zha¬†2 ‚Äì approx. \$1.90‚ÄØbillion (non‚ÄëHollywood Chinese animated film leads)
* Lilo & Stitch ‚Äì approx. \$1.02‚ÄØbillion
* A Minecraft Movie ‚Äì approx. \$955‚ÄØmillion
* Jurassic World Rebirth ‚Äì approx. \$731‚ÄØmillion
* How to Train Your Dragon ‚Äì approx. \$610‚ÄØmillion

**Last week‚Äôs box office performance (Monday‚ÄìSunday):**

* The Fantastic Four: First Steps ‚Äì domestic debut \~\$118‚ÄØM; global \~\$218‚ÄØM, Marvel‚Äôs biggest opening of 2025
* Superman ‚Äì added \~\$94‚ÄØM worldwide last week, passing \$500‚ÄØM global total
* Jurassic World Rebirth ‚Äì up \~\$70‚ÄØM worldwide last week, despite \~40‚ÄØ% drop week‚Äëon‚Äëweek
* F1: The Movie ‚Äì up \~\$48‚ÄØM last week internationally/domestically growth visible
* Lilo & Stitch ‚Äì added \~\$10‚ÄØM worldwide last week, slower tail but still billion‚Äëplus gross

**Highlights & trends:**
Fantastic Four‚Äôs strong debut reboots Marvel success, signaling resumed audience interest; Superman continues to hold strong; Jurassic World Rebirth remains durable after holiday surge; surge in box office recovery noted across key titles. Overall box office up \~12‚Äì15‚ÄØ% year‚Äëon‚Äëyear.

---

üì∞ **Industry Buzz**

1. Christopher Nolan has signed to direct a massive \$250‚ÄØmillion adaptation of Homer‚Äôs *The Odyssey*, starring Matt Damon and Tom Holland, with Imax pre‚Äësales at 95‚ÄØ% capacity across major locations.
2. Marvel has relaunched the *Fantastic Four* franchise successfully with *First Steps*; positive CinemaScore and strong visuals marking a fresh start.
3. DC‚Äôs *Superman* continues strong with over \$500‚ÄØM global, solidifying DC‚Äôs summer comeback.
4. Universal‚Äôs *Jurassic World Rebirth* continues strong overseas, especially in China, contributing to \$318‚ÄØM global in opening holiday weekend.
5. Warner Bros.‚ÄìDiscovery stock surges (\~30‚ÄØ%) amid box office rebound, with Disney, IMAX and Cinemark also seeing robust growth in 2025.
6. *Ne Zha¬†2* becomes highest‚Äëgrossing animated and non‚ÄëHollywood film ever, crossing \$2‚ÄØbillion globally‚Äîthough not Hollywood, its impact on global trends is notable.
7. *Mission: Impossible ‚Äì The Final Reckoning* quietly solidifies strong global numbers (\~\$562‚ÄØM) and continues reliable franchise performance.

---

üé• **Must‚ÄëWatch in Theatres (Surat, India)**

* **The Fantastic Four: First Steps** ‚Äì Currently showing in English/Hindi/Tamil/Telugu in Surat cinemas; hyped globally, strong visuals, action‚Äëheavy, best experienced in IMAX or premium formats if available in Surat multiplexes. Runs this week.
* **F1: The Movie** ‚Äì Available in Surat in multiple languages, strong reviews praising adrenaline‚Äëfuelled direction and visuals and growing fan hype; ideal in standard or Dolby formats for immersive sound and speed feel.
* **Jurassic World Rebirth** ‚Äì Still playing in Surat, popular with family audiences; grand visuals and dinosaur action well‚Äësuited to IMAX or large format screens.

---

That‚Äôs all for today‚Äôs briefing. Have a great theatrical weekend ahead!

### Cool, right? But here‚Äôs the twist:
Swap in ChatGPT ‚Äî GPT‚Äë3.5 Turbo (‚âà‚ÄØ$0.002/run), GPT‚Äë4o (‚âà‚ÄØ$0.009/run), or GPT‚Äë4.5 (‚âà‚ÄØ$0.15/run) ‚Äî and the briefing goes nuclear: cleaner, richer, straight‚Äëup ‚Äúdid‚Äëa‚Äëhuman‚Äëwrite‚Äëthis?‚Äù energy.
Basically IMAX‚Äëgrade output for the cost of a coffee‚Ä¶ or a flex if you go full 4.5.
